name: phoneguide-fsapp
description: A simple FS App using phoneguide-api to create and store users and phones

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fsopen-2021/part2/phoneguide && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../../../phoneguide/
scripts.deploy: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && git push heroku main

author: zerok1986
